main event: A co-pilot on a London-to-Frankfurt flight reported sighting a streak-shaped object with a bright light moving across the aircraft's path on December 6, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright core and a dim tail of light behind it., The sighting lasted for about 4 to 5 seconds., The object crossed the flight path at approximately 30 degrees to the left., A check with the Frankfurt flight service revealed no other aircraft in the area during the sighting., The report concludes that the observed object was probably a meteor.
witness description: co-pilot of the British European Airways flight #402
